title: The PNW Components Loam Stem is Here!
content:
Previewed in our Sea Otter coverage this year, the PNW Components Loam Stems have finally arrived. These 6061 aluminum stems come in 31.8⌀ and 35⌀ mm clamp diameters, 32 mm or 40 mm lengths, and four colors, pictured above. Best of all, these precision-milled and finished stems run for $99 and feature a lifetime warranty. Check out more at PNW Components.

The post The PNW Components Loam Stem is Here! appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
